alert.note: Alert for Wallowa County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:50PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Wallowa County through 445 PM PDT... At 349 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Enterprise to 9 miles southwest of Joseph. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Enterprise, Joseph, Lostine, Imnaha and Hells Canyon Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
